education.area: Engineering Science (Focus in electrical engineering & applied mathematics)

highlights: Taught 3D parametric modeling using Creo Parametric to 90+ engineering students
Influenced comprehension of parametric design fundamentals including modeling, drafting, and 2D documentation drawing
work.company: Department of Engineering Science, Trinity University

highlights: Processed, cleaned, and filtered EEG time-series frequency data for 400+ human subjects using EEGLABS and signal processing MATLAB toolboxes
Designed database to describe five error types, from the data collection method, seen in the dataset.
Implemented matlab scripting to remove artifacts based on the their time-series location
Applied k-means clustering to the error types and terminal location to assess the usability of each headset system
Assessed the similarity of the frequency domain content of common electrodes using a data-driven unsupervised k-means clustering approach
work.company: Brain-Machine Interface Lab, University of Houston/ Methodist Health

projects.name: CAPCHA Solver
projects.description: Developed convolutionary neural network to bypass a CAPTCHA system using OpenCV for image processing and Tensorflow and Keras to build and train the deep learning model . Contanerized with a python Docker image.

projects.name: Two-player Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.description: A two-player command line implementation of tic-tac-toe implemented with basic data structures, logic, and pointers
